translations.en:
: ** ğŸ‘¤ During your journey you arrive in a seaside town. There you meet a man, who says that his name is Price and that he is a mercenary.

ğŸš¶ Pay him to accompany you to your next destination
ğŸ– Get to know each other over a good meal
ğŸ¤‘ Try to steal money from him

translations.fr: ** | ğŸš¶ Contre un peu d'argent, il accepte de vous accompagner. Vous partez donc, et peu de temps plus tard, vous tombez sur une rutilante Ã©pÃ©e plantÃ©e dans un rocher. Vous tentez de la sortir, mais vos efforts ne s'avÃ¨rent pas concluants. Price essaie Ã  son tour, et arrive Ã  dÃ©loger l'arme de sa carapace pierreuse. translations.en: ** | ğŸš¶ For a little money, he agrees to come with you. You leave, and shortly afterwards you come across a shiny sword stuck within a rock. You try to pull it out, but you aren't successful. Price tries too, and he manages to dislodge the weapon from its stony shell. Knowing that he wouldn't have gotten it without you, he gives you much more money than you paid him as a thank you. The rest of the trip being uneventful, you split up after a few days.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸš¶ Contre un peu d'argent, il accepte de vous accompagner. Pendant votre pÃ©riple, vous tombez par chance sur une sacoche abandonnÃ©e le long du chemin. Heureux de cette dÃ©couverte, vous dÃ©cidez d'en partager le contenu avec Price. Vous obtenez ainsi une rondelette somme d'argent, et un objet qui sera, vous le pensez, utile Ã  votre aventure.
translations.en: ** | ğŸš¶ For a little money, he agrees to come with you. During your journey, you come across an abandoned satchel along the way. Happy with this discovery, you decide to share its contents with Price. You thus obtain a small sum of money, and an item which you think will be useful for your adventure.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸš¶ Contre un peu d'argent, il accepte de vous accompagner. Vous cheminez ensemble pendant un petit moment sans que rien de particulier ne se passe, exceptÃ© un petit incident avec des voleurs qui ne firent pas long feu face Ã  Price. Puis vous vous quittez.
translations.en: ** | ğŸš¶ For a little money, he agrees to come with you. You walk together for a little while without anything special happening, except for a small incident with thieves which didn't last long with Price's help. You then split up

translations.en: ** | ğŸš¶ You give him a few coins to accompany you until the next town. You leave quickly, and when the sun goes down, you bivouac and then you set. You are suddenly woken up by the sound of metal clattering together, and it takes a few seconds to realize that Price is taking your money away. Without thinking twice about it, determined to stop him, you run to him. He violently punches you into the temple, and runs away with your possessions while you are dizzy. ğŸ¤•

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ– Vous proposez Ã  Price de manger quelque chose ensemble, et il accepte. Vous discutez un moment, buvez un peu, riez beaucoup, Ã©changez des astuces, commencez Ã  vous connaÃ®tre. C'est avec un lÃ©ger pincement au coeur que Price vous dit adieu au bout de quelques heures, devant aller honorer un contrat.
translations.en: ** | ğŸ– You offer Price something to eat together, which he gladly accepts. You talk for a while, drink a little, laugh a lot, exchange tips, and get to know each other. It is with a slight twinge of heart, that Price bids you farewell after a few hours, having to go and honour a contract.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ– Vous demandez Ã  Price s'il veut venir manger avec vous Ã  la taverne locale. Il dÃ©cline, disant avoir du travail, et part.
translations.en: ** | ğŸ– You ask Price if he wants to come eat with you at the local tavern. He declines, telling you he has work to do, and takes his leave.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ¤‘ Vous essayez de le voler, mais il vous remarque, et vous assomme proprement. ğŸ¤•

translations.en: ** | ğŸ¤‘ He notices your attempted theft immediately, but lets you go, yet not without giving you a look of disdain. You run away quickly, fearful of what he might have done to you.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ—£ï¸ After you've had a little chat, you split up. A few blocks away, you're attacked by a group of rude-looking people, who lighten your purse under the threat of their blows.
